phrs.translation: 把卸扣拆开, 解去, 解去把卸扣拆开, 除去锁

sentences.sentence: Unshackle the port anchor from the chain before three o'clock afternoon.
sentences.translation: 下午 3 点以前把左 锚从锚链上卸下来。

sentences.sentence: Wireless communication is ubiquitous, after all, so why can't we permanently unshackle our electronics from power cables too?
sentences.translation: 既然如今无线通信已无处不在，那么对供电来说，我们何不同样永久摆脱电源线的束缚呢？

sentences.sentence: When countries of the size of China and India, together accounting for 2.5 billion people begin to unshackle their creative energies, it impacts on the whole world.
sentences.translation: 当中印人口加起来有25亿的大国摆脱束缚，发挥创造力的时候，它的影响注定是世界性的。
